channel.title: 508 Webclient help? (phpbb3)
channel.description:
now im not going to ask sum1 to make me a webclient (even tho id love that 2 happen ^^ )
how do i start it off i do have my 508 cache and my Client + source i have a phpbb3 Forums BUT can i put a webclient on the forums?
AND if i can How would i do so?
PLEASE dont post a stupid basic link to webclient Tutorial ive read most of them.... and for the nubs that will most deffinetly throw me a link to google...please go F**k yourself :)
will add any1 that can help to the making of my Webclient either staff or co owner of the Server ? <-- decent reward for a little bit of help, eh?
